title: cant login at the moment anyone else?
body:
keeping getting this error , even though my nets online and it says the server is online

the login server did not respond. You may have a connection issue that is not related to the League of Legends server. See our current Service Status here: http://status.leagueoflegends.com

If you are still unable to connect, please check the following Knowledge Base article: support.leagueoflegends.com/entries/234161-Connection-Failure-Error-When-Logging-In

Still unable to connect? Contact Player Support at support.leagueoflegends.com

anyone else? halp!!!!

replies.body:
Hi folks

We're aware of some server issues at the moment and our engineers are working on a fix... We'll update you with more info as we have it.

Best,
Mindstar

Hi again.

It looks like things are recovering at this point - let me know if you are still having issues logging in or starting games.

Mindstar
ranked is down, server maintenance says 8 - 12 pm AEST but its 11:20 and just dropped, am I missing something because even normal times are 4 - 8 AEST

Hi - Ranked is showing as up for me - Can you relog and check again?

Cheers
Mindstar
Nice one riot, i sent a ticket about this 2 days ago and i kept getting referred to bs links, couldn't admit ur servers r shit could ya
all good now, just started showing again, also had a game earlier. when it finished apparently it didn't exsist. might be a bug just letting you know
I won game I should be in promo, and it says I am not in promo? Why I need answers plz I just won system said I freakin WOn the game
Client died just as I was banning in a ranked game lobby, wasn't able to lock in the champ. If this counts as a dodge for me I'm going to be super pissed.
probably will but if you send a support ticket and tell them it was server side problem, they can fix it up usually

> [{quoted}](name=BarryButcher,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=i3l8TnqN,comment-id=00050000,timestamp=2016-07-20T12:29:57.030+0000)
>
> probably will but if you send a support ticket and tell them it was server side problem, they can fix it up usually

how can I send a support ticket can u tell me plz ?

> [{quoted}](name=IndianGamer,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=i3l8TnqN,comment-id=000500000000,timestamp=2016-07-20T12:54:53.200+0000)
>
> how can I send a support ticket can u tell me plz ?

You can submit a ticket by going to the following website:
https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new
top of this page click support. top of that page click "submit a request"

now ranked is down though
:(

oh wtf maintenance nevermind
didnt even notice lol

nvm back on lol
{{summoner:4}}
back on
yup same here

me too :( amumu sad
{{champion:32}}

that was a quick fix
try now
i had the same problem
I had this same issue, wasn't even able to log in to comment on here. :/ It appears whatever it was is fixed, as I'm now back online!
Won a game, then came back to the client telling me PVP.NET had been disconnected. Going to be super pissed if the win isn't recorded :/
Can't understand why.. Finished a game couldn't do nothing.. Can't log on now ..
Fkin riot, I just won my game, and I should be in my promos WTF ??????? bcoz of this issue the game doesn't count WTF RIOT ? I won my game ?
same problem bois just finished a game and got immediately disconnected and now I cant log in...rip
wait just got in
I'm back in
I am fine now
getting stuck on logging on then getting connection failed ffs
A mate and i were having the same problem but just then he was able to log in and my client is logging on its just being slow
yea, GG Riots
I'm showing as disconnected from PVP.net in client and unable to reconnect to chat. Someone accidentally unplug the server or something?
Yeah
same, just won a match and stuck in screen and to log out, now cannot log in
servers down. i got kicked from post game lobby.
I'm the same dude, don't know whats wrong.
me too
me too
